body: @ssnake42069 - Yes it has been translated already. Here is one from two months ago. https://nhentai.net/g/329579/ - New translations? If its not just click hunting? Different, sometimes better, wording. Improving, or removing, the censored bits. Or the translator just feels like it.
yeah but hasnt it been translated already? why re-translate?
@shadowofintent1 Notice each time this was released, another translated chapter is ending. Since there will be another 1 more final chapter, it will be posted again.
@shadowofintent you know every series does this, they post all of the released chapters as new ones get released or translated. Its not that big of a deal.
Holy fuck. How many times is this going to be posted?? This is like the third or fourth time already
